# Lumtina

A simple and easy python library.

-----------
STATS: 
![PyPI - Downloads](https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/lumtina)
![PyPI - Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/lumtina)
-----------

## Installation

How to install?

By using pip:

```bash
pip install lumtina
```
